markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Voice of the Night](/Feats.aspx?ID=1340) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You hear and understand the words of creatures you share the darkness with. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) with [bats](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=12), [rats](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=86), and [wolves](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=101). You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on such animals.
name: Voice of the Night
